name: Sweets (Brain in a Bowl)
description:
You wake up on the floor.

What happened? Why? It's up to you to find out.

A massive rip-off very much inspired by Disco Elysium, but with less communism.

My submission for MiniJam 66. A short adventure game, but I actually managed to finish this one in time.

Controls

Left and right arrows to make decisions. That's it.
